title: 6-Person ALL-STAR Kinda Feudy - Game Showdown
description:
Go to http://factormeals.com/kindafunny50 and use code kindafunny50 to get 50% off your first box plus 20% off your next box.

Go to http://dragonsdogma.com to buy the game and start your epic quest today.

Go to http://robinhood.com/boost to subscribe to Robinhood Gold and get a 3% match on every dollar you transfer in from another retirement account. Offer good through April 30th.

Today we're playing Kinda Feudy with a full house! 6 people, three teams, only one team will win.

Follow Lucy: https://twitter.com/Luceobrien
Follow Kallie: https://twitter.com/inkydojikko
Follow Meg: https://twitter.com/MegFables
Follow Sara: https://twitter.com/SaraAlfageeh
Follow Karrie: https://twitter.com/karriebearr
Follow Xalavier: https://twitter.com/WritNelson

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:17 - Kinda Feudy
00:07:58 - Round 2
00:17:25 - Round 3
00:21:22 - Round 4
00:25:17 - Round 5

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny
